program main

    implicit none

    integer*8 :: T, S, q, previous

    integer :: answer, second_result, bills

    character(len=20) :: third_input

    ! First step

    read*, T, S, q

    previous = S

    answer =0

    do while ( previous < T)

        answer = answer +1

        previous = previous * q

    end do

    ! Second step

    second_result =1

    ! Third step

    write(third_input,*) second_result

    third_input = adjustl(third_input)

    integer :: len, i

    len = len_trim(third_input)

    integer, dimension(0:len) :: digits

    digits =0

    do i =1, len

        integer :: pos = len -i +1

        digits(i-1) = ichar(third_input(pos:pos)) - ichar('0')

    end do

    bills =0

    do i=0, len

        if (digits(i) ==10) then

            digits(i+1) = digits(i+1)+1

            digits(i) =0

        end if

        if (digits(i) <5) then

            bills = bills + digits(i)

        else if (digits(i) ==5) then

            if (digits(i+1) >=5) then

                digits(i+1) = digits(i+1)+1

            end if

            bills = bills +5

        else

            digits(i+1) = digits(i+1)+1

            bills = bills + (10 - digits(i))

        end if

    end do

    print*, bills

end program main

program main

    implicit none

    integer*8 :: T, S, q, previous

    integer :: answer, second_result, bills

    character(len=20) :: third_input

    ! First step

    read*, T, S, q

    previous = S

    answer =0

    do while (previous < T)

        answer = answer +1

        previous = previous * q

    end do

    ! Second step

    second_result =1

    ! Third step

    write(third_input,*) second_result

    third_input = adjustl(third_input)

    integer :: len, i

    len = len_trim(third_input)

    integer, dimension(0:len) :: digits

    digits =0

    do i =1, len

        integer :: pos = len -i +1

        digits(i-1) = ichar(third_input(pos:pos)) - ichar('0')

    end do

    bills =0

    do i=0, len

        if (digits(i) ==10) then

            digits(i+1) = digits(i+1)+1

            digits(i) =0

        end if

        if (digits(i) <5) then

            bills = bills + digits(i)

        else if (digits(i) ==5) then

            if (digits(i+1) >=5) then

                digits(i+1) = digits(i+1)+1

            end if

            bills = bills +5

        else

            digits(i+1) = digits(i+1)+1

            bills = bills + (10 - digits(i))

        end if

    end do

    print*, bills

end program main
